data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Zagrebačka, Croatia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zagrebačka, Croatia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,305 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, encourage the 1,305 believers in Zagrebačka to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Over 7.68 percent of the people of Zagrebačka are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bosniak people.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Zagrebačka, Croatia to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 309,700 souls in Zagrebačka and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zagrebačka, Croatia has a population of 309,700.

We estimate Zagrebačka has 1,305 people who might know Jesus, 284,601 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,794 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Zagrebačka, Croatia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

location.name: Zagrebačka
location.cities_list: Zaprešić, Samobor, Dugo Selo, Ivanić-Grad, Jastrebarsko
location.cities_list_w_pop: Zaprešić (19,664), Samobor (15,956), Dugo Selo (10,453), Ivanić-Grad (9,379), Jastrebarsko (5,493)
